1.0.0.name: wordpress/tinyurl-service
1.0.0.description:
TinyURL Service allows you to generate a TinyURL shortlink for post, pages and custom post types.

Do you prefer to use Bit.ly?

With Bit.ly Service you can use Bit.ly, or even better, Bit.ly Pro to generate shortlinks for all of your blogs Posts, Pages and Custom Post Type.
